basic.description: The objective of this course is the understanding of the fundamental physics associated with a nuclear reactor. Topics include a brief review of basic nuclear physics, neutron interactions and cross-sections, neutron diffusion, neutron moderation, theory of reactors, changes in reactivity, control of reactors. Offered in alternate years.
basic.subject: ENPH
basic.title: Physics Of Nuclear Reactors

extra.enrollment_requirement:
COREQ: ENPH 242 or ENPH 342
Must be registered in BSCE.
